name: Pankration! (In effect)
description: This Round, when a player announces the end of their Round: The player who hasn't ended their Round draws 2 cards.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>This Round, when a player announces the end of their Round:</color> The player who hasn't ended their Round draws 2 cards.
